nodes.bodyText: @a-korzhov you mis-copied it, the charset parameter is missing
@a-korzhov you mis-copied it, you added a charset parameter while it wasn't here before
@a-korzhov youchanged the code, it was output, not new OutputTo(output)
@a-korzhov you added .name(), it wasn't there before
@a-korzhov here you added charset that shouldn't be here

@a-korzhov here too

Guess I understood the logic, but then, why I dont have to put charset here, if the message is '... copied with UTF_8 charsets name'?
@a-korzhov I meant "here too there is a problem". Just take care of not changing the test behaviour, only that it is correctly verifying the output content as per the @todo description
